entry.title: Wi-Fi Calling - Help and Support - Boost Mobile
entry.content:
Does Boost support Wi-Fi Calling?

Wi-Fi calling enables you to make calls using a fixed Wi-Fi connection from your compatible Boost phone when you can’t connect to the mobile network. Your phone simply uses your Wi-Fi network instead of the mobile network, so you can make and receive calls as you would normally.

 

To use Wi-Fi calling, you need to:

  • Have a Wi-Fi calling compatible smartphone or tablet
  • Have 4G voice calls enabled
  • Have up-to-date software
  • Turn on Wi-Fi calling

 

How do I turn on Wi-Fi calling?

For iPhone:

  1. Go to Settings
  2. Select Mobile
  3. Turn on Wi-Fi calling

 

For Android devices:

  1. Go to your phone's calling app
  2. Select More or the three dots in the top right corner
  3. Select Settings
  4. Turn on Wi-Fi Calling

entry.title: Included Calls - Help and Support - Boost Mobile
entry.content:
What types of calls are included in Boost plans?

All our plans include unlimited calls and text to standard national numbers, which means you can call regular landline and mobile numbers as much as you like. This also includes most 1800, 1300 or 13 numbers.

It excludes calls and texts to international numbers, satellite and premium numbers (eg. 19xx numbers), operator assisted calls (most 12xx numbers) and all use overseas.

Some of our plans also include standard calls to international numbers.

For more information about our current plan inclusions, click here.

entry.title: MMS Inclusions - Help and Support - Boost Mobile
entry.content:
Is MMS included my plan?

Yes! MMS is included in all Boost Mobile plans as part of your unlimited standard national calls & text inclusions. 

If you are on a $35+ plan, then your plan also includes an allocation of standard international text (including MMS) to any destination.

For more information about our current plans, click here.

entry.title: Need a Little Extra Data on Your Boost Mobile Plan?
entry.content:
Need a little Extra data?

Extras are perfect for those times that you need just a bit more on top of your current recharge. You can grab one using your favourite recharge method.

The current Boost Mobile Prepaid Plan has two Extra’s available:

  • $5 Data Pack – includes 1GB with a 7 day expiry
  • $20 Data Pack – includes 4GB with a 28 day expiry.

If you’re on Boost Anytime Ultra or Boost Anytime Plus (joined Boost between 31 October 2017 and 1 February 2021 and have not been updated to Boost Mobile Prepaid), there are two Add-Ons available.

  • $5 Add-On – includes 1B of data and $5 credit that can be used towards data (at standard rates), calls & text to satellite and premium numbers (e.g. 19xx numbers), operator assisted calls (most 12xx numbers)
  • $15 Add-On – includes 3GB of data and $15 credit that can be used towards data (at standard rates), calls & text to satellite and premium numbers (e.g. 19xx numbers), operator assisted calls (most 12xx numbers) and international calls and text from Australia not included in your recharge.

If you’re on UNLTD Plus (joined Boost between 12 July 2016 – 31 October 2017 and have not been updated to Boost Mobile Prepaid) you can grab a $15 Bolt-On.

If you’re on UNLTD (joined before 12 July 2016 and have not changed your offer) you can grab a $10 Add-On. Both include credit to use on international calls/text, data and premium services.

entry.title: International Roaming Help
entry.content:
How do I use my phone overseas? 

You can continue to use your Boost service in selected overseas destinations. Simply recharge using the My Boost Mobile app. Your roaming pack will start as soon as you purchase it. Check out our International Roaming page for more information and FAQs.

entry.title: Boost Mobile Call Rates
entry.content:
How much do calls cost?

All of our plans include unlimited calls and text to standard national numbers.

Our current Boost Mobile Prepaid plan also includes unlimited international calls to 20 selected destinations, on recharges of $30+. See international for full details on the international inclusions for your recharge.

entry.title: Boost International Calls & Rates
entry.content:
How much do International calls cost?

With Boost Mobile Prepaid, recharges of $35 or more include; unlimited international calls to 20 selected destinations, an allocation of minutes to a further 30 destinations and an allocation of texts to any country in the world.

See international calls for full details of the international inclusions for your recharge.

If you're heading overseas, we also have roaming options available. Head to our International Roaming page for more info.
